alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Natrona and southern Johnson Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 915 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midwest, or 24 miles southeast of Kaycee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Midwest around 920 PM MDT. Edgerton around 925 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 226 and 232. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
